item.description:

item.title: How do transactions leave the memory pool?
item.description:
How do transactions leave the memory pool?

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. It's 100% free, no registration required. Sign up Here's how it works: Anybody can ask a question Anybody can answer The best answers are voted up and rise to the top How does my bitcoin core client know when to drop a transaction from the memory pool?

item.title: Taiwan Turning Out to Be a Bitcoin Tourist Destination - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Taiwan Turning Out to Be a Bitcoin Tourist Destination - NEWSBTC

The increasing bitcoin adoption in Taiwan is turning it into a Bitcoin tourist destination, attracting tech-nomads and Bitcoin community members. The adoption of Bitcoin can happen in the unlikeliest of places. Taiwan is one such place where the growth of digital currency has taken outsiders by surprise.

item.title: Understanding The Real Value of Bitcoin Mining
item.description:
Understanding The Real Value of Bitcoin Mining

There are a lot of aspects to the Bitcoin mining ecosystem. Many outsiders see this as a waste of resources, particularly when taking into account how miners receive a small reward for doing so. But the mining process is not just about money; it is also a way to secure the Bitcoin network.

item.title: Brexit to Lead Bitcoin Price Beyond $800 ? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Brexit to Lead Bitcoin Price Beyond $800 ? - NEWSBTC

Following Brexit, the digital currency is expected to rise and cross the $700 mark soon and maybe even touch $800. Read more... The value of Bitcoin has shown a significant increase from what it was a couple of days ago, following the Brexit Results.

item.title: Bitcoin and Blockchain Leading the Revolution in the Global Monetary System
item.description:
Bitcoin and Blockchain Leading the Revolution in the Global Monetary System

A technology revolution is disrupting the financial services industry and could make digital currency and blockchain transactions commonplace in just a few years, financial technology and fintech experts argued in a session on the topic at the Annual Meeting of the New Champions 2016.
